attributes.action: never let an England manager play Frank Lampard and Steven Gerrard in the same team, ever again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the fact that they can't play together for England, and no England manager seems to have noticed, it should be made illegal to put them in the starting line-up together.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
